title: Therapy? - High Anxiety
description:

192Kbps

1.Hey Satan - You Rock 
2.Who Knows 
3.Stand in Line 
4.Nobody Here But Us 
5.Watch You Go 
6.If It Kills Me 
7.Not In Any Name 
8.My Voodoo Doll 
9.Limbo

12.Never Ending (Hidden Track) 

Front, Back And CD Covers Included.


Therapy? are a strange bunch. Malingering somewhere between the political and the comic, the punky, the poppy and the metallic, they&#039;ve spent 15 years purposefully avoiding categorisation. If only there were more bands with that kind of courage. So, High Anxiety is a welcome return after two painful years without a drummer or a record deal. True to form, they&#039;ve recruited a sticksman from the very top drawer. Where 2001&#039;s Shameless employed Barrett Martin, the powerhouse behind Screaming Trees, High Anxiety features Neil Cooper from the criminally ignored the Beyond. The effect is immediate, Cooper adding a vital edge and energy to a set of songs that, for the most part, would not make it onto any Therapy? hits package. Highlights are the opening, rumbling and humorously blasphemous "Hey Satan--You Rock", the bitter and menacing "Not in Any Name", the epic, howling closer "Rust" and "Limbo" which knowingly quotes from the Beyond&#039;s "Eve of My Release". Also excellent is the hidden track "Never Ending", a despairing pop metal that really should be on the CD proper (you can find it after seven minutes of "Rust"). Fans will find much to enjoy here.


I am sorry about the last attempt at this torrent, I don&#039;t know what happened. I seeded it to half a dozen people fine and then left but unfortunately they all buggered of without seeding anymore and when i tried to re-seed it kept saying I only had 99.6% so I am starting again apologies.
